errors.error_description: The conda installation command uses the wrong channel (`conda` instead of `conda-forge`) and incorrect flag order, which will likely fail.
correction_candidates: The command should be `conda install lifelines`.
The correct channel is `anaconda`, not `conda`. The command should be `conda install -c anaconda lifelines`.
Change the command to `conda install lifelines --channel conda-forge`.
The correct command is `conda install -c conda-forge lifelines`.
errors.golden_answer: The correct command is `conda install -c conda-forge lifelines`.
